SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccountManagement
Class that facilitates full access privileges to all accounts/users in any branch Class allows for adding,editing and removal of any account(Staff,Manager and Admin) Class directly interacts with CSV Database when removing , editing or Adding new Account information
Admin
Administrator class that extends from User Class A specialization of a type of user Administrator class is given highest access and methods to fully edit and change the states and attributes of Staff,customer order and branch under the Administrator Administrator also has unique functionalities like transfering, promoting managers and removing a payment option for a branch
AdminPage
UI interface for Administrator Provide options to execute actions that Administrator can carry out by calling functions of Administrator class
Branch
Class representing branch of the Fast-Food chain The branch is of entity stereotype and composes of other classes and actors like staff and customer This class serves more as a all-encompompassing tool to host operations and users within a fast-food branch
Branch.OperationStatus
Class object representing if the branch is closed or open A branch being closed is to be differentiated from a branch being "shut down" Certain attributes like all the branch's staff and menu remain when the branch is closed.Preventing the need to re-initialize upon opening branch at opening hours
BranchManagement
Class that interacts with the CSV DataBase by facilitating reading,writing and
BranchNotFoundException
Class that throws exception when a branch is not located
BranchSelectionPage
Class that Allows users to choose their preferred branch and brings them to the options provided by said Branch The class's purpose is mainly to be used for directing Users to a new page when they choose so within "CustomerInterface" class.
CardPaymentMode
CardPaymentMode Inherits from the Abstract class "PaymentMode" The class represents methods facilitating Payment using Card Stereotype: Entity
Cart
This Class represents the All Cart items, including Type of Food Item and it's quantity
CartItem
Inherits the Item Class, this class also represents Food Items but not as a singular Quantity.
CartManagement
This Class is to facilitate "retrieving","adding" and "removing" Food items on the user's Cart
CartPage
The Class Displays User Interface for Cart The Class will Display,Edit,Clear and Remove items in the cart according to user's preference
CustomerInterface
Customer Interface is the entry point for Overall Customer Interface. Creates new objects of related classes for "Branch selection", "Ordering page","Adding/Customizing order" and "Payment"
Database
DataBase class is meant to read and load Staff,Branch and menu list from our Database Database is a csv file containing all records of the afore mentioned classes
FastfoodOrderingAndManagementSystem
Class is the entry point for running the whole Fast-Food Management system Serves as the starting UI for staff/manager or customer to interact with, and will direct respective parties to their UI Pages
FileRead
Class is designed to facilitate reading in from the CSV DataBase
FileWrite
Class design for writing all data collected during UI runtime to CSV DataBase
Filter
Allows Specified selection of Users based on specified attributes This helps provide information of user's with only attribute(specified by user) For example: to filter out all staff by age
InputOutOfRangeException
Exception class that gets thrown if input is out of range
Item
Class to represent an individual food item option
Item.Category
Enumeration Variable to determine Type of Food Item
ItemEditor
Class facilitates the editing of a food item Attributes of the food items that can be changed are : ID,Name,Price and Category
ItemManagement
This class allows for adding,removing and editing of any item within the Branch This is to be differentiated from a customer editing their own cart items,this class interacts with the branch as a totality
LoginPage
Class is of boundary stereotype and represents the UI for any staff member to login with a valid password Class will reject Login attempt after 3 tries
Manager
CLass extends from staff class, specialization as Manager Class Has all the capabilities of Staff, but can also add,remove and edit food items in a branch
ManagerManagement
Class allows for manipulation of the Managers in a certain branch Facilitates the movement and or removal of managers within a certain branch
ManagerPage
Class is of the Boundary Stereotype and represents the UI for Manager After login in Class will asks manager for options/actions to take and call the respective functions of the manager class
MenuPage
class facilitates the menu selection UI for customers It is the page where customers will choose what items from the menu they wish to add into their cart
OnlinePaymentMode
Class that inherits from PaymentMode, intended to represent Online Payment Similar to PaymentMode, it lets customers know if the option is available This class also allows setting availability of online payment option
OpeningTimeEditor
Class used for setting an opening time for branch Branch also verifies the validity of the timespan of opening hours
OperationStatusEditor
Class that facilitates the changes in operation status of the branch
Order
Class representing orders of customers The class's main goal is to consolidate all food items and requests by a customer's order so that staff can process the order The object interacts is of "entity" stereotype and interacts with staff, customer and manager when is comes to adding or processing the order
Order.DiningOption
Dining option represents the 2 dining options available to the customer
Order.OrderStatus
OrderStatus represents the 3 different state of customer order:New,Ready to collect , and Collected
Order.PaymentMode
Payment mode represents the 2 current available payment mode for customers: online and Card
OrderDisplay
Class for printing onto UI all items ordered by customer Class is mainly used as a means to show customers their receipt This includes the type,name,quantity,price and description of the food items
OrderingPage
Class serves as a UI Page for Customer to decide to checkout or return to ordering UI Class will also facilitate the checking out of customer's order and directing customer to Payment UI
OrderManagement
Facilitates the manipulation of any customers orders in the branch This is different from "ItemManagement", where item management focused on all food items within the branch This class focuses on all orders made by customers within the branch, which also contain all food item along with their respective quantities
OrderProcessor
The class simulates the actual processing of the customer's order and making of the customer's order Hence this class will change the order status of the order
PaymentMode
Interface for different payment modes to implement through inheriting/implementing this interface Type : Entity
PaymentPage
Class serves as a UI Page for Customer to decide to how they wish to dine and their payment preference This UI comes subsequently after customer has checkout on the "OderingPage" UI
ReceiptPrintingPage
Class that prints out the receipt for customers to view upon payment
Staff
This Class extends from User Class.
StaffEditor
Class that facilitates the editing of staff information, which includes: name,gender,age,etc.
StaffInterface
General UI for staff after they login The class will direct staff to their respective login pages based on what type of staff they are.
StaffManagement
Class allows for manipulation of the Staff in a certain branch Facilitates the movement and or removal of Staff within a certain branch
StaffPage
UI interface for Staff, Boundary stereotype Provide options to execute actions that Staff can carry out by calling functions of Staff class
User
Class for "User" represents the 3 types of users that can access Fast-Food Ordering Management with a password This includes: Admin ,Manager and Staff The main purpose of User Class is to store important information regarding the Users Stereotype: Entity
User.Gender
enumeration Class declaration representing Gender
User.UserType
enumeration Class declaration that representing Admin, Manager and Staff
ViewingPage
Class is meant to represent a UI where ALL customers are able to view and see if their order is still being prepared or if their order is ready for collection Class also facilitates the picking up of customers orders if it is ready to be collected
